name: trackly
description: Trackly is a self-hosted service for tracking habits or metrics over time. It records entries and renders charts and summaries to help visualize personal progress.

features.title: Habit Tracking
features.description: Record daily habits and metrics to build consistency and monitor progress over time

features.title: Metric Logging
features.description: Track quantifiable metrics like weight, mood, or custom measurements with flexible data types

features.title: Chart Visualization
features.description: View progress through charts and graphs that highlight trends and patterns

features.title: Historical Data
features.description: Access complete history of all tracked habits and metrics for long-term analysis

features.title: Custom Metrics
features.description: Define custom tracking categories that match your specific goals and interests

features.title: Progress Summaries
features.description: Review summaries showing completion rates, streaks, and overall progress

features.title: Simple Entry
features.description: Log data quickly with minimal friction using streamlined input forms

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep all personal tracking data on your own server with complete control
